articles.description: The budget-friendly 10-inch Android tablet features a decent 2K IPS display as well as an octa-core processor, which turn the Lenovo Tab M10 Plus Gen 3 into a viable media consumption device for frugal users with a rather tight budget.
articles.content: While some people like to watch movies and TV shows on their smartphone while on vacation, others prefer a slightly bigger screen for their media consumption away from home. A laptop or convertible i… [+1403 chars]

articles.title: Nothing Phone (2) Releases in NYC with Pop-Up and CEO Carl Pei - Bloomberg
articles.description: The Nothing Phone (2) entered the US market for the first time with a pop-up in New York City.
articles.content:
Tino Hernandez, a recently graduated mathematics major, got in line for the Nothing Phones first pop-up in the US at 9 a.m., 10 hours before it opened.
